Plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as distress call, their landing on the source planet finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform. Continuing their journey back to Earth with the attacked crew having recovered and the critter deceased, they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.
Title: Alien
Writer: Dan O'Bannon (story), Ronald Shusett (story), Dan O'Bannon (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Skerritt, Sigourney Weaver, Veronica Cartwright, Harry Dean Stanton
